verses.verse: And <WG2532> After <WG3326> These Things <WG5023> I Saw <WG1492> An Angel <WG32> Descending <WG2597> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Heaven, <WG3772> Having <WG2192> Authority <WG1849> Great : <WG3173> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> Was Enlightened <WG5461> With <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG1391> His Glory. <WG846>

Because <WG3754> Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Wine <WG3631> Of The <WG3588> Fury <WG2372> <WG3588> Fornication <WG4202> Of Her <WG846> Have Drunk <WG4095> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Nations; <WG1484> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Kings <WG935> Of The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> ' With <WG3326> Her <WG846> Did Commit Fornication, <WG4203> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Merchants <WG1713> Of The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> Through <WG1537> The <WG3588> Power <WG1411> <WG3588> <WG4764> Of Her Luxury <WG846> Were Enriched. <WG4147>

Render <WG591> To Her <WG846> As <WG5613> Also <WG2532> The <WG846> <WG3778> Rendered <WG591>, To You; <WG5213> And <WG2532> Double Ye <WG1363> To Her <WG846> Double, <WG1362> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG2041> Her Works. <WG846> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Cup <WG4221> Which <WG3739> She Mixed, <WG2767> Mix You <WG2767> To Her <WG846> Double. <WG1362>

So Much As <WG3745> She Glorified <WG1392>, Herself <WG1438> And <WG2532> Lived Luxuriously, <WG4763> So Much <WG5118> Give <WG1325> To Her <WG846> Torment <WG929> And <WG2532> Mourning. <WG3997> Because <WG3754> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2588> Her Heart <WG846> She Says, <WG3004> I Sit <WG2521> A Queen, <WG938> And <WG2532> A Widow <WG5503> <WG3756> I Am Not : <WG1510> And <WG2532> Mourning <WG3997> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> May I See. <WG1492>
